task_description: Administrative task: Set up teams in Linear workspace - no code changes required

patterns.administrative_task_pattern: This is a Linear workspace onboarding task that operates entirely within Linear's platform. No codebase modifications are needed.

existing_implementations.description: Not applicable - this task does not involve the ACGS2 codebase

task_completion_options: Mark Linear issue XN-2 as complete if teams are already configured
Follow Linear documentation to set up teams if needed
Invite team members via Linear settings if needed
Close as not applicable if this is a solo project
